column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////After hearing about JINYA for some time
column2: I was finally willing to give it a try since its location is prime for anyone that works downtown. I have to say I was not blown away. My favorite part of the whole meal was the JINYA bun
column3: which is probably the only thing I would reorder. For ramen
column4: I had the Tonkotsu White (with no spicy sauce). I felt like the broth just didn't have as much taste as I was expecting
column5: especially since it was both chicken and beef brother. The chasu was really good and made the ramen enjoyable but none of the other ingredients really stood out to me.
